message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,000,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,500,000.
